 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתָרִים‎</span> **proper name, of a location** only [[Num.21.1|Num 21:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶח הָא‎</span>; so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]], perhaps ([[BDB#Di|Di]]) name of a caravan-route, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***vestige, footprint***; others (after [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]) translate ***way of the spies*** (compare [[Num.13.22|Num 13:22]]); but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאֲתָרִים‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתָּרִים‎</span> is highly improbable, and a locality would hardly receive its designation from the spies.
